object.name: Capabilities.
object.description: This object contains parameters relating to the hardware capabilities of the PGW server.

parameter.name: BearerContextListNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: IMSI
parameter.description: IMSI (International Mobile Subscriber Identity) is the subscribers permanent identity.

parameter.name: MSISDN
parameter.description: The basic MSISDN of the UE. The presence is dictated by its storage in the HSS.

parameter.name: RAT type
parameter.description: Current RAT

parameter.name: APNListNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: APNList.{i}.
object.description: The following entries are repeated for each APN.

parameter.name: APN in use
parameter.description: The APN currently used.

parameter.name: APN-AMBR
parameter.description: The maximum aggregated uplink and downlink MBR values

parameter.name: PDNConnectionListNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: PDNConnectionList.{i}.
object.description: The following entries are repeated for each PDN connection within the APN.

parameter.name: IP Address(es)
parameter.description: IPv4 address and/or IPv6 prefix

parameter.name: PDN type
parameter.description: IPv4, IPv6, or IPv4v6

parameter.name: S-GW Address in Use
parameter.description: (control plane) The IP address of the S-GW currently used for sending control plane signalling.

parameter.name: S-GW TEID for S5/S8
parameter.description: (control plane) S-GW Tunnel Endpoint Identifier for the S5/S8 interface for the control plane.

parameter.name: P-GW IP address for S5/S8
parameter.description: (control plane) P-GW IP address for the S5/S8 for the control plane signalling.

parameter.name: P-GW TEID for S5/S8 (control plane)
parameter.description: P-GW Tunnel Endpoint Identifier for the S5/S8 control plane interface. (For GTP-based S5/S8 only).

parameter.name: BCM
parameter.description: The negotiated Bearer Control Mode for GERAN/UTRAN.

parameter.name: Default Bearer
parameter.description: Identifies the default bearer within the PDN connection by its EPS Bearer Id.

parameter.name: EPSBearerListNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: EPSBearerList.{i}.
object.description: The following entries defining the EPS Bearer specific parameters are included within the set of parameters defining the PDN Connection. The following entries are stored only for GTP-based S5/S8.

parameter.name: EPS Bearer Id
parameter.description: An EPS bearer identity uniquely identifies an EPS bearer for one UE accessing via E-UTRAN

parameter.name: TFT
parameter.description: Traffic Flow Template

parameter.name: S-GW Address in Use
parameter.description: (user plane) The IP address of the S-GW currently used for sending user plane traffic.

parameter.name: S-GW TEID for S5/S8
parameter.description: (user plane) S-GW Tunnel Endpoint Identifier for the S5/S8 interface for the user plane.

parameter.name: P-GW IP address for S5/S8
parameter.description: (user plane) P-GW IP address for user plane data received from PDN GW.

parameter.name: P-GW TEID for S5/S8
parameter.description: (user plane) P-GW Tunnel Endpoint Identifier for the GTP Based S5/S8 interface for user plane.

parameter.name: EPS Bearer QoS
parameter.description: ARP, GBR, MBR, QCI.
